name: Pluto
wikiSummary: "I did ‘Pluto’ on a synthesizer. Trying to be as hardcore as I could. Then Mark Bell added a beat to it." - Livebox, 2002.  "'Pluto', that was me and Mark having a laugh in Spain. It was a day like this , and we got a little amp outside and a keyboard and I just did all these really punk things, just really thinking heavy metal." - Mixmag, 1997.  "It's about getting plastered, that need to destroy everything so you can start over again.
wikiText: "I did ‘Pluto’ on a synthesizer. Trying to be as hardcore as I could. Then Mark Bell added a beat to it." - Livebox, 2002. "'Pluto', that was me and Mark having a laugh in Spain. It was a day like this [hot and sticky], and we got a little amp outside and a keyboard and I just did all these really punk things, just really thinking heavy metal." - Mixmag, 1997. "It's about getting plastered, that need to destroy everything so you can start over again. Having a lot in the planet Pluto (astrologically speaking, Björk has a lot of Scorpio, which is ruled by Pluto, in her birth chart, as well as Pluto in conjunction with her Midheaven), which I do, means you want to cut the crap, throw all the rubbish away. No extra baggage. It's death and birth." - Raygun, September 1997 User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
